regen.absent_element: handling invalid or unreachable device sensor status
regen.new_specification: The system shall handle scenarios where a device sensor status is invalid or unreachable, providing alerts or fallback measures to maintain safe operations in degraded mode.

regen.absent_element: detailed control specifications for closure devices in degraded mode
regen.new_specification: The system shall define operational limits and exceptions for controlling closure devices down to the sensor level during degraded mode.

regen.absent_element: handling invalid or faulty device sensor status
regen.new_specification: The system shall initiate a fail-safe protocol if any device sensor reports an invalid or faulty status during operation.

label: The system shall abort the device if the status is unknown.
absence: situation of the device status is unknown
